Title: A Scept-acular Time
Description:
There are some exciting orders to fill this week! The students at Algeth'ar Academy have been going horns over heels for these fun scepters.

Why don't you assist with some of the scepters?
ObjectivesText: Craft 3 Scepter of Spectacle: Fire and 3 Scepter of Spectacle: Air for Soragosa in Valdrakken.
